H0.text: the mughal garden of rashtrapati bhavan is modelled on which garden. Shalimar Gardens

H1.text: the mughal garden of rashtrapati bhavan is modelled on which garden. Versailles Gardens

H2.text: the mughal garden of rashtrapati bhavan is modelled on which garden. Babur Garden

H3.text: the mughal garden of rashtrapati bhavan is modelled on which garden. charbagh

A4.text: The main garden consists of two channels intersecting at right angles running in the cardinal directions divide this garden into a grid of squares: a charbagh.
